title: [Large-Scale] Capacity-Building Program for Mobile Media-Based Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer software proficiency, intermediate or higher language learning competency (including grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension, and writing), and experience in self-directed learning in digital environments
context.additional_context: A flexible digital learning environment prioritizing self-directed language content (text analysis, voice recording, vocabulary quizzes) over real-time interaction. Emphasizes personalized activities for improving reading comprehension and expressive skills.

learning_goals: Learners independently design language learning content (text, audio, vocabulary materials) using various mobile media tools (recording/editing apps, SNS-based collaboration platforms).
Learners complete formative assessments (quizzes, voice feedback) provided in mobile environments with over 80% accuracy and analyze grammatical structures and expression methods.
Learners independently resolve over 90% of technical issues (storage management, compatibility issues) encountered while using mobile media and apply solutions to diverse language learning scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
